attributes.action: Create a grant for small businesses affected by the Low Emission zone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I own a non-compliant vehicle that must be replaced by July i have recieved no warning from DVLA as yet no official word at all that i will need to find £200 per day when i use my van. we (small business/ owner operators) must receive compensation or a grant equivelent to those paid by other european countries running similar schemes to replace the vehicles by the beginning of June. or I will need 5 years advance warning so the next van my company purchases will be hybrid, dual fuel, hydrogen etc.
How green is it to scrap hundreds or possibly thousands of vehicles or to devalue them reducing the gross worth of the national economy ( a small amount I concede ) only to have to build new ones in factories to replace the lost fleets creating industrial pollution in the process DUH!!!
This stinks of ‘money go round’ politics.
